sen.j: 観世 紅雪（かんぜ こうせつ、1843年（天保14年） - 1911年（明治44年）3月31日）は、シテ方観世流能楽師。
sen.e: Kosetsu KANZE (1843-March 31, 1911) was a Noh actor, shite-kata (main roles) of Kanze school.
Kosetsu KANZE (1843 - March 31, 1911) was a Nohgakushi (Noh actor) playing shite (principal roles) of Kanze-ryu school.

sen.e: The fifth family head of the Tetsunojo KANZE family, and his name was Kiyohisa.

sen.e: The Kanze family head accompanied the Tokugawa clan who moved to Shizuoka at the time of the Maiji Restoration.

sen.e: Since his younger brother Genjiro was an adopted son of Minoru UMEWAKA, he used to accompany the Umewaka family (his name was Rokuro at the time).

sen.e: When the family head Kiyotaka KANZE died in 1888, he became the conservator of the successor Kiyokado KANZE, who was very young at that time.

sen.e: He let his eldest son 織雄 to succeed the name Tetsunojo, and he began to use the name Kosetsu.
